#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#define gc getchar
typedef long long int ll;
using namespace std;
ll read_int() {
char c = gc();
while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
ll ret = 0;
while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
c = gc();
}
return ret;
}
int main()
{
    ll t,n,x,y,i;
    t=read_int();
    while(t--)
    {
        n=read_int();
        ll a[n],b[n-1];
        memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
        for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
        {
            x=read_int();
            y=read_int();
            a[y]++;
            b[i]=x;
        }
        for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
        {
            if(a[b[i]]==0)
            {
                cout<<b[i]<<'\n';
                break;
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
